name: Breakfast Empires
description:
A 4X that's part of a complete breakfast

Command the Eggs, Bacon and other peoples to control the land of Breakfast. A game can take 5-60 minutes depending on map size and enemies.

This build is limited to tier 2 cities and soldiers. 2 more tiers, a new faction, and more maps are in progress!

Getting started

You can control everything with the mouse. Look in the options menu for a list of hotkeys. Almost everything has a tooltip for more information.

Eggs are the easiest faction to use, so they're a good choice for your first game.

Good, bad, and/or ugly? Let me know!

Leave a comment below! What's your favorite map and faction? Do you have any ideas to improve the game? Found any bugs?

Known Bugs

  • Hotkeys can stop working if switching between windows. (Opening and closing the game menu fixes this. They also start working again after you end turn. )
  • When setting up a game, multiple players may have the same color. (You can fix this by manually assigning a different color) 
  • The AI knows how many soldiers are in an enemy city with palisades, even if it didn't build a watch tower.
  • Once in a while, the faction-specific building isn't available after conquering a city from a different faction.
